title: Drawing, Battle Between Indians and Warriors, ca. 1590
medium: Pen and brown ink, gray wash, laid down
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal rectangle. The Indians are in the left foreground and center shooting their bows. The battle fire of the Europeans with guns is in the right center. A bay with landing boats and five big ships is in the right and central back.

participants.person_name: Jan van der Straet, called Stradanus

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Battle Between Indians and Warriors, ca. 1590. Pen and brown ink, gray wash, laid down. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2637
